lejos.hardware

Interface Brick

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EV3, NXT
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalEV3, RemoteEV3, RemoteNXT, RemoteRequestEV3

    public interface Brick

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Audio getAudio()

    • Method Detail

      • getPort

        Port getPort(java.lang.String portName)
        Return a port object for the request port name. This allows access to the hardware associated with the specified port.
        Parameters:
        portName - The name of port
        Returns:
        the request port

      • getPower

        Power getPower()
        return a battery object which can be used to obtain battery voltage etc.
        Returns:
        A battery object

        Returns:
        A Audio device

        Returns:

        Test whether the brick is a local one
        Returns:
        true iff brick is local
